strapiPost.title: The Best of XNA in 2022
strapiPost.content:
With 2022 coming to a close, Fare Flight NWA put together their top 5 "best successes" at XNA.

  • New routes: Coming in at the top were the new direct flight routes, which include Orlando, Phoenix, and Tampa. XNA additionally received $500K in funding to create a SFO route.
  • Expansion and growth: Separate from the flights, XNA has taken steps to making your experience even more fly with a new vendor, Einsteins Bagels, and a $30m+ expansion.

Checkout the full article HERE.
